channel.title: Posts on Tractor Fox Short Film Festival 2017
channel.author: Alexander Ivanov

item.title: Festival Date Announcement
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description: We are pleased to announce that the festival will take place on the 23rd of December. Details on the venue will be released shortly.

item.title: Tractor Fox Film Short Film Festival idea conceived
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description: Whilst getting inspiration at the Edinburgh Short Film Festival, the team had their eureka moment! Plans were afoot to make this the event of the year!

item.title: TractorFox Concept was born
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description: Sometime whilst attending the University of Edinburgh, the idea of TractorFox emerged organically after some Galahads.
